trans-unit.source: Generates a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Data.TypedDataSetGenerator> class takes information provided (for example, an XML schema) and creates a typed dataset class.
Generates a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> based on an existing <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
Generates a strongly typed <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
The dataset is created in the namespace indicated in the `codeNamespace` parameter, and the dataset is generated in the managed programming language indicated in the `codeProvider` parameter.
The source <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> that specifies the metadata for the typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
The namespace that provides the target namespace for the typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
The language-specific <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> to use to generate the dataset.
A strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
Generates a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> based on the provided input file.
Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
Call this method only with trusted data.
For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
Generates a strongly typed <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
A string that represents the XML schema to base the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> on.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> to contain the generated code.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that contains the generated dataset.
The language-specific <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> to use to generate the dataset.
A strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
Generates a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> based on the provided input file.

The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that contains the generated dataset.
The language specific <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> to use to generate the dataset.
A HashTable that maps connections to specific providers in the typed dataset.
Generates a strongly typed <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> based on the provided input file.

The to use to override the provider contained in the inputFileContent.

Returns the first provider name found in the provided input file.
Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
Call this method only with trusted data.
For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
This method returns the first provider name in the specified `inputFileContent`.
A string that represents the XML schema to base the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> on.
A string that represents the specific provider for this <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
Returns the provider name for the tableName in the input file.
Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
Call this method only with trusted data.
For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
Returns the provider name for the given `tableName` in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
A string that represents the XML schema to base the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> on.
A string that represents the name of the table to return the provider name from.
A string that represents the provider name for the specific table passed in to the tableName parameter.
Gets or sets the collection of assemblies referenced in a typed dataset.
The generator iterates over this list and adds the assemblies to your project.
A collection containing all referenced assemblies in the dataset.
